synopsis.text:
Afternoon Magazine's popular comic, Yu-go, comes to life with the world's most accomplished negotiator, Beppu Yuugo. Armed only with words, Yuugo's unmatched negotiation skills have led him to successfully resolve countless dangerous situations without resorting to violence or threats. His calm demeanor and extensive knowledge allow him to connect with the humanity within his adversaries, be they terrorists, criminals, or kidnappers.

In this thrilling anime adaptation, Yuugo is called out of a period of inactivity to face two challenging cases. The first takes him to the scorching deserts of Pakistan, where he must negotiate the release of a hostage from deadly enemies. The second case leads him to the icy landscapes of Russia, where he must navigate treacherous terrain and political intrigue to achieve his goal.

With his life on the line and the fate of others in his hands, can Yuugo use his mastery of language and psychology to turn words into weapons and succeed in his missions? Join him on his journey to find out.
